mapper.insert: INSERT INTO CLASSS VALUES( 'cNo' || cno_seq.nextval, #{ornerId}, #{title}, #{comment}, #{memberCount}, 1, #{level}, #{local}, #{schedule}, #{time}, 'abc', DEFAULT, #{cateId}, SYSDATE )
mapper.select: select * from ( select * from classs where orner_id = #{id} order by class_create_date desc) where rownum = 1
